org.cyclops.integratedcrafting.api.network

Interface ICraftingNetwork

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftingNetwork

    public interface ICraftingNetwork
    A network capability for crafting.

      • getChannels

        int[] getChannels()
        Returns:
        The channels that have at least one active position.

      • getCraftingInterfaces

        Get all crafting interfaces for the given channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The crafting channel.
        Returns:
        Crafting interfaces.

      • getRecipeCraftingInterfaces

        Get the recipe to interface mapping for the given channel.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Get the recipe index on the given channel.
        Parameters:

        The index.

      • addCraftingInterface

        boolean addCraftingInterface(int channel,
                             ICraftingInterface craftingInterface)
        Add a crafting interface to the network.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel of the interface.
        craftingInterface - A crafting interface.
        Returns:
        If the crafting interface did not exist before in the network.

      • removeCraftingInterface

        boolean removeCraftingInterface(int channel,
                                ICraftingInterface craftingInterface)
        Remove a crafting interface from the network.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel of the interface.
        craftingInterface - A crafting interface.
        Returns:
        If the crafting interface existed.

      • addCraftingInterfaceRecipe

        boolean addCraftingInterfaceRecipe(int channel,
                                   ICraftingInterface craftingInterface,
                                   org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe)
        Add the given recipe that is owned by the given crafting interface. This should only be called for differential changes, otherwise addCraftingInterface(int, ICraftingInterface) should be called.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel of the interface.
        craftingInterface - A crafting interface.
        recipe - The recipe to add.
        Returns:
        If the recipe was added.

      • removeCraftingInterfaceRecipe

        boolean removeCraftingInterfaceRecipe(int channel,
                                      ICraftingInterface craftingInterface,
                                      org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe)
        Remove the given recipe that is owned by the given crafting interface. This should only be called for differential changes, otherwise removeCraftingInterface(int, ICraftingInterface) should be called.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel of the interface.
        craftingInterface - A crafting interface.
        recipe - The recipe to remove.
        Returns:
        If the recipe was removed.

      • scheduleCraftingJob

        void scheduleCraftingJob(CraftingJob craftingJob,
                         boolean allowDistribution)
                  throws UnavailableCraftingInterfacesException
        Add the given crafting job to the list of crafting jobs.
        Parameters:
        craftingJob - The crafting job.
        allowDistribution - If the crafting job is allowed to be split over multiple crafting interfaces.
        Throws:
        UnavailableCraftingInterfacesException - If no crafting interfaces were available.

      • onCraftingJobFinished

        void onCraftingJobFinished(CraftingJob craftingJob)
        Called by crafting interfaces when the crafting job is finished and should be removed from all lists.
        Parameters:
        craftingJob - The crafting job.

      • cancelCraftingJob

        boolean cancelCraftingJob(int channel,
                          int craftingJobId)
        Cancel the given crafting job. This will also cancel all its dependencies.
        Parameters:
        channel - A channel id.
        craftingJobId - The crafting job id.
        Returns:
        If the crafting job existed.

      • getCraftingJobs

        java.util.Iterator<CraftingJob> getCraftingJobs(int channel)
        Parameters:
        channel - A channel id.
        Returns:
        Get all present crafting jobs.

      • getCraftingJob

        @Nullable
CraftingJob getCraftingJob(int channel,
                                     int craftingJobId)
        Parameters:
        channel - A channel id.
        craftingJobId - A crafting job id.
        Returns:
        The crafting job with the given id or null.

      • getCraftingJobs

        <T,M> java.util.Iterator<CraftingJob> getCraftingJobs(int channel,
                                                      org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent,
                                                      T instance,
                                                      M matchCondition)
        Get present crafting jobs for the given (expected) output instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The instance type.
        M - The matching condition parameter.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel.
        ingredientComponent - The ingredient component of the given output type.
        instance - The expected output instance.
        matchCondition - The matching condition under which the instance should be matched.
        Returns:
        The applicable crafting jobs, can be empty.

      • getCraftingJobDependencyGraph

        CraftingJobDependencyGraph getCraftingJobDependencyGraph()
        Returns:
        An overview of all crafting job dependencies in this network.

      • getCraftingJobInterface

        @Nullable
ICraftingInterface getCraftingJobInterface(int channel,
                                                     int craftingJobId)
        Get the interface in which the given crafting job is being crafted.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel.
        craftingJobId - A crafting job.
        Returns:
        The owning crafting interface or null.

      • getRunningTicks

        long getRunningTicks(CraftingJob craftingJob)
        Calculate the number of ticks the given job has been running.
        Parameters:
        craftingJob - A crafting job.
        Returns:
        The number of ticks this job has been running.
